com.digi.xbee.api.utils

Class ByteUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.utils.ByteUtils

  • public class ByteUtils
extends Object
    Utility class containing methods to work with bytes and byte arrays and several data type conversions.

        public static int byteArrayToInt(byte[] byteArray)
        Converts the given byte array (4 bytes length max) into an integer.
        Parameters:
        byteArray - Byte array to convert to integer (4 bytes length max).
        Returns:
        Converted integer value.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if byteArray == null.
        See Also:
        intToByteArray(int)

        Returns:
        Converted long value.
        Throws:

        See Also:

      • isBitEnabled

        public static boolean isBitEnabled(int containerInteger,
                   int bitPosition)
        Returns whether the specified bit of the given integer is set to 1 or not.
        Parameters:
        containerInteger - Integer to check the given bit position enablement state.
        bitPosition - Position of the bit to check its enablement state.
        Returns:
        true if the given bit position is set to 1 in the containerInteger, false otherwise.

      • longToByteArray

        public static byte[] longToByteArray(long value)
        Converts the given long value into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        value - Long value to convert to byte array.
        Returns:
        Byte array of the given long value (8 bytes length).
        See Also:
        byteArrayToLong(byte[])

      • newByteArray

        public static byte[] newByteArray(byte[] data,
                  int finalSize)
        Generates a new byte array of the given size using the given data and filling with ASCII zeros (0x48) the remaining space.

        If new size is lower than current, array is truncated.

        Parameters:
        data - Data to use in the new array.
        finalSize - Final size of the array.
        Returns:
        Final byte array of the given size containing the given data and replacing with zeros the remaining space.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if data == null.

      • readBooleanFromByte

        public static boolean readBooleanFromByte(byte containerByte,
                          int bitOffset)
        Reads a boolean value from the given byte at the given bit position.
        Parameters:
        containerByte - Byte to read boolean value from.
        bitOffset - Offset inside the byte to read the boolean value.
        Returns:
        The read boolean value.

      • readBytes

        public static byte[] readBytes(int numBytes,
               ByteArrayInputStream inputStream)
        Reads the given amount of bytes from the given byte array input stream.
        Parameters:
        numBytes - Number of bytes to read.
        inputStream - Byte array input stream to read bytes from.
        Returns:
        An array with the read bytes.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if numBytes < 0.
        NullPointerException - if inputStream == null.
        See Also:
        readString(ByteArrayInputStream), readUntilCR(ByteArrayInputStream)

      • readIntegerFromByte

        public static int readIntegerFromByte(byte containerByte,
                      int bitOffset,
                      int bitLength)
        Reads an integer value from the given byte using the given bit offset and the given bit size.
        Parameters:
        containerByte - Byte to read the integer from.
        bitOffset - Offset inside the byte to start reading integer value.
        bitLength - Size in bits of the integer value to read.
        Returns:
        The integer read value.

      • readString

        public static String readString(ByteArrayInputStream inputStream)
        Reads a null-terminated string from the given byte array input stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Byte array input stream to read string from.
        Returns:
        The read string from the given ByteArrayInputStream.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if inputStream == null.
        See Also:
        readBytes(int, ByteArrayInputStream), readUntilCR(ByteArrayInputStream)

      • readUntilCR

        public static byte[] readUntilCR(ByteArrayInputStream inputStream)
        Reads from the given byte array input stream until a CR character is found or the end of stream is reached. Read bytes are returned.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Byte array input stream to read from.
        Returns:
        An array with the read bytes.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if inputStream == null.
        See Also:
        readBytes(int, ByteArrayInputStream), readString(ByteArrayInputStream)

        Converts the given short value into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        value - Short value to convert to byte array.
        Returns:
        Byte array of the given short (2 bytes length).
        See Also:

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value == null.

        Parameters:
